org.helm.editor.utility.xmlparser.validator

Interface TemplateValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UITemplateValidator

    public interface TemplateValidator
    All .xml validators in HELM Editor must inherit this inerface
    Author:
    Alexander Makarov
